products.name: Rice Krispies
products.description: Delicious corn-based rice grains melted together with marshmallows into a square-like shape.

products.name: Flamin Hot Cheetos
products.description: No one knows what's in the powder that covers these snacks, but wow is it amazing!

products.name: Pencil
products.description: Are you an unprepared student? Well this pencil will help you at least take notes. You might still be unprepared.

products.name: Notebook
products.description: Forgot your Ipad at home. It's time to bring out that classic notebook.

products.name: Airpods
products.description: Do you hate those pesky wires holding you down from your greatest potential? Well, it's time to get airpods. Now only do they offer freedom but they only offer clout amongst your peers.

products.name: T-shirt
products.description: Didn't feel like doing the laundry this week? Just buy a new shirt.
